headline: University league tables 2016
standfirst: Find a course at a UK university

headline: University guide 2016: league table for accounting & finance
standfirst: The study of the rules, standards and methods involved in recording financial information within organisations

headline: University guide 2016: league table for agriculture, forestry & food
standfirst: The study of land-based industries, such as farming, countryside management and animal rearing - includes agriculture, forestry, food and beverage studies

headline: University guide 2016: league table for American studies
standfirst: The study of American culture, literature, history and politics – includes Canadian and Latin American studies

headline: University guide 2016: league table for anatomy & physiology
standfirst: The study of how the human body works – includes anatomy, physiology and pathology, ophthalmics, and aural and oral sciences

headline: University guide 2016: league table for anthropology
standfirst: The study of the human species, its culture, social relations, systems of knowledge and history - may cover language, physiology, art, ritual and belief

headline: University guide 2016: league table for architecture
standfirst: Design and creation of buildings. Involves the study of the sciences, humanities and fine and applied arts

headline: University guide 2016: league table for art
standfirst: The study of - and training in - drawing, painting, sculpture, printmaking and other media

headline: University guide 2016: league table for biosciences
standfirst: The study of life, from molecules to populations – includes nutrition, biology, botany, zoology, genetics, microbiology and molecular biology

headline: University guide 2016: league table for building and town and country planning
standfirst: The study of all aspects of buildings (except design), from construction to location – includes urban, rural and regional planning

headline: University guide 2016: league table for business, management & marketing
standfirst: The study of organisations - marketing, human resource management, and administrative functions

headline: University guide 2016: league table for chemistry
standfirst: The science of matter – the composition of substances, their properties and reactions

headline: University guide 2016: league table for classics & ancient history
standfirst: Language, history, culture and literature of ancient Greece and Rome – includes Latin and classical Greek studies

headline: University guide 2016: league table for computer science & information
standfirst: The study of the design and technology of computing - includes information systems, software engineering, programming and artificial intelligence

headline: University guide 2016: league table for dentistry
standfirst: Dentists study prevention, detection, management and treatment of oral and dental diseases, and the maintenance of oral and dental health

headline: University guide 2016: league table for design & crafts
standfirst: The study of the design of everyday objects, taking into account technology, commerce and aesthetics. May cover computers as design tools

headline: University guide 2016: league table for drama & dance
standfirst: Drama students will study theatre management, scenery, costume and lighting. Dance students will learn about music, choreography and drama

headline: University guide 2016: league table for earth & marine sciences
standfirst: The study of the Earth, seas, rivers and the atmosphere - includes geology and ocean sciences

headline: University guide 2016: league table for economics
standfirst: The study of what influences income, wealth and wellbeing, and how this can be implemented into policy

headline: University guide 2016: league table for education
standfirst: The study of how people develop and learn – including education studies, undergraduate teacher training and academic studies in education

headline: University guide 2016: league table for chemical engineering
standfirst: The practical application of maths and science to design, develop and produce everyday products on a large scale

headline: University guide 2016: league table for civil engineering
standfirst: The study of the creation and maintenance of infrastructure - roads, bridges, railways, energy systems, flood defences and water supply

headline: University guide 2016: league table for electronic & electrical engineering
standfirst: Engineering of electrical and electronic systems, microelectronics, silicon devices and nanotechnology

headline: University guide 2016: league table for general engineering
standfirst: Encompasses the application of science, maths and computing skills to solve practical problems

headline: University guide 2016: league table for materials & mineral engineering
standfirst: Study of how things are made and could be improved – including materials science, minerals technology, ceramics and glass, polymers and textiles

headline: University guide 2016: league table for mechanical engineering
standfirst: Encompasses the analysis, design, manufacturing and maintenance of all types of mechanical system, including the production and use of heat and mechanical power

headline: University guide 2016: league table for English & creative writing
standfirst: Critical study of literature - poetry, novels, plays - and language

headline: University guide 2016: league table for fashion & textiles
standfirst: The study of - and training in - the design and use of textiles and other materials to create clothing

headline: University guide 2016: league table for film production & photography
standfirst: The study of all aspects of film making and of the creation of still images on photographic film or plates

headline: University guide 2016: league table for forensic science & archaeology
standfirst: The scientific study of materials involved in investigative procedures. May include the study of chemical processes and other scientific techniques

headline: University guide 2016: league table for geography & environmental studies
standfirst: Geography and environmental studies is about the relationships between people, places and the planet

headline: University guide 2016: league table for health professions
standfirst: The study of ophthalmics, the oral and aural sciences and medical technologies including radiography

headline: University guide 2016: league table for history
standfirst: The study of the past – politics, economics, culture, religion and society

headline: University guide 2016: league table for history of art
standfirst: The historical study of developments in the arts, in terms of methods, techniques and critical reception

headline: University guide 2016: league table for hospitality, events and tourism
standfirst: Covers courses in providing food, drink and accommodation in a service context, managing events, and the impact and development of tourism

headline: University guide 2016: league table for journalism, publishing and PR
standfirst: The study of reporting, photographing, editing, and publishing digitally and in print. Public relations courses examine reputation management

headline: University guide 2016: league table for law
standfirst: The study of criminal legal systems – includes criminology and jurisprudence

headline: University guide 2016: league table for mathematics
standfirst: The study of quantities through analysis, deduction and calculation - including mathematics, operational research and statistics

headline: University guide 2016: league table for media & film studies
standfirst: The study of communication through broadcasting, film and the media. May cover technical innovations in film and the role of audiences

headline: University guide 2016: league table for medicine
standfirst: The study of pre-clinical medicine and clinical medicine to maintain health, diagnose and treat disease in order to become a doctor

headline: University guide 2016: league table for modern languages & linguistics
standfirst: Includes modern languages from around the world and their literatures, as well as linguistics

headline: University guide 2016: league table for music
standfirst: The study of creative expression through sound, including performance, technique, composition and various styles

headline: University guide 2016: league table for nursing & midwifery
standfirst: The study of the care of the sick and injured - includes nursing and medical technology

headline: University guide 2016: league table for pharmacy & pharmacology
standfirst: The study of the management and dispensing of medicines (pharmacy), and medicinal drugs and effects on the body (pharmacology)

headline: University guide 2016: league table for philosophy
standfirst: The study of how to think about ideas and ask questions about truth, right and wrong – includes ethics, history of philosophy, logic

headline: University guide 2016: league table for physics
standfirst: The study of the universe - includes astrophysics, space science, applied physics, medical physics

headline: University guide 2016: league table for politics
standfirst: The study of government and society – political thought, public policy, global politics, institutions and electoral studies

headline: University guide 2016: league table for psychology
standfirst: The quest to explain behaviour through the study of the human mind

headline: University guide 2016: league table for religious studies and theology
standfirst: The study of religious belief systems, including Christian theology, Islam and Buddhism

headline: University guide 2016: league table for social policy & administration
standfirst: The study of contemporary social, political and economic problems – and potential policy responses to them

headline: University guide 2016: league table for social work
standfirst: How to find practical solutions to protect vulnerable people – includes community studies

headline: University guide 2016: league table for sociology
standfirst: The study of human societies and how they interact

headline: University guide 2016: league table for sports science
standfirst: The scientific study of exercise, health and sport

headline: University guide 2016: league table for veterinary science
standfirst: The study of the diagnosis and treatment of disease and injury in animals, welfare, public health and pharmaceuticals
